meanings.definition: In a state of deep unconsciousness
meanings.sent1: The patient remained comatose after the accident.
meanings.sent2: The comatose man lay still in the hospital bed.
meanings.sent3: The comatose cat didn't even flinch when the toy mouse moved.
meanings.sent4: The city was comatose under the blanket of heavy snow.
meanings.sent5: Her comatose state was a stark reminder of the fragility of life.

meanings.sent1: The boring lecture left the students comatose.
meanings.sent2: The comatose driver failed to notice the traffic light change.
meanings.sent3: The comatose computer screen displayed nothing but a frozen image.
meanings.sent4: The comatose sloth barely moved from its tree branch.
meanings.sent5: His comatose response to the joke showed his lack of humor.
